title: Fashioning the Enslaved Servant, an interview with Dr. Jonathan Michael Square
itunes:title: Fashioning the Enslaved Servant, an interview with Dr. Jonathan Michael Square
description:
This week Dr. Jonathan Michael Square joins us to discuss some of his object based research into Brooks Brother's coats worn by enslaved servants during the 19th century.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
